meaningMnemonic: To <kanji>run alongside</kanji> the <kanji>line</kanji> (referring to the train line) means <vocabulary>along the train line</vocabulary>. What's along the train line? All kinds of things if you look carefully.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
